conbody.p: The water heaters covered in this manual require a 120-VAC, 1Ã˜ (single-phase), 60-Hz, 15-amp power supply and must also be electrically grounded in accordance with local codes or, in the absence of local codes, with the National Electrical Code, ANSI/NFPA 70 or the Canadian Electrical Code, CSA C22.1.
